item.title: The first fair pet insurance that rewards responsible pet parents. Created for Yorkshire Terriers!
item.dc:creator: support@joinfluffy.com
item.content:encoded:
Why Your Yorkshire Terrier Needs Pet Insurance

Yorkshire Terrier Breed Overview

The Yorkshire Terrier is a small dog breed of Terrier type, developed during the 19th century in Yorkshire, England. The defining features of the Yorkshire Terrier are its small size, its silky, glossy, long and parted blue and tan coat, and its confident, independent character. It is placed in the Toy Terrier section of the Terrier Group by the Fédération Cynologique Internationale and in the Toy Group or Companion Group by other kennel clubs, but is often included with other small terriers in the Terrier Group.

Most Common Health Issues for Yorkshire Terrier

  • Dental disease
  • Hypoglycemia
  • Luxating patella
  • Tracheal collapse
  • Portosystemic shunt
  • Legg-Calvé-Perthes disease
  • Collapsed trachea
  • Allergies
  • Yorkshire Terrierism

Why Yorkshire Terrier Needs Pet Insurance

As a Yorkshire Terrier owner, you want to do everything you can to keep your pup healthy and happy. But no matter how careful you are, accidents and illnesses happen – and they can be expensive. That’s where pet insurance comes in. Pet insurance can help cover unexpected veterinary costs, so you can focus on what’s important – taking care of your furry friend.

Average Vet Bill for Yorkshire Terrier

The average vet bill for a Yorkshire Terrier is $1,200. This includes routine care, such as vaccinations, as well as unexpected illnesses and accidents. Pet insurance can help you cover these unexpected costs, so you’re not left with a large bill.

Interesting Facts About Yorkshire Terrier

  • Yorkshire Terriers were originally bred to catch rats in clothing mills.
  • The Yorkshire Terrier is the sixth most popular dog breed in the United States.
  • The world’s smallest dog on record was a Yorkshire Terrier named “Miracle Milly” who weighed in at just 2.5 ounces.
  • Yorkshire Terriers have been featured in movies such as “The Shaggy Dog” and “Men in Black.”
  • The Yorkie is the national dog of Scotland.

Best Type of Insurance for Yorkshire Terrier

The best type of insurance for a Yorkshire Terrier is a policy that covers accidents and illnesses, with a optional rider for routine care. This will help you cover the unexpected costs of accidents and illnesses, as well as the routine care your pup needs to stay healthy.
